# Johnson & Sons Ltd

> Family-owned builders and concrete specialists based in Whangarei, Northland, New Zealand. 21+ years of experience delivering complex retaining walls, concrete works, and residential renovations.

## About

Johnson & Sons Ltd is owned and operated by Reuben and Teneille Johnson in Whangarei, Northland. Reuben is the builder â€” an NZQA qualified carpenter with over a decade of experience at Fletcher Engineering in Auckland, where he worked as a foreman on major infrastructure projects including the Onewa Road widening, Golden Bay cement bulk store and service centre, Victoria Park tunnel, North Shore Hospital, and ANZ Tower extension.

He now brings that commercial-grade discipline to residential projects in Northland.

## Services

- **Concrete Specialist**: Insitu concrete pours, self-compacting concrete, architectural board mark detailing, complex pours, and precast installation.
- **Retaining Walls**: Structural landscaping and heavy-duty retaining solutions for difficult Northland sites.
- **Decks & Renovations**: High-quality timber decking, house renovations, and complex structural changes.

## Location

- Based in: Whangarei, Northland, New Zealand
- Service area: Whangarei and wider Northland region

## Qualifications

- NZQA National Certificate in Carpentry
- 21+ years construction experience
- Former Fletcher Engineering foreman (10+ years on Auckland infrastructure projects)
